metadata.title: Friday, 22nd October, 2021
metadata.session: FIRST SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why the construction of township roads in Kabwe Central Parliamentary Constituency has stalled;
(b) when the project will resume;
(c) what the total cost of the project is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to install street lights in Chalabesa in Kanchibiya District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the project is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a vocational skills training centre in Kasempa District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is;
(d) what the estimated time frame for undertaking the project is; and
(e) what courses will be offered at the centre, once completed.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a dual carriageway on the Great North Road between Prospects and Memaco Farms in Kabwe District;
(b) if so, when the plan will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) how many hunting concessions were issued in the following Game Management Areas (GMAs) in Kasempa District as of July, 2020:
(i) Kasonso-Busanga; (ii) Lunga-Busanga; and (iii) Kasempa-Lunga-Luswishi;
(b) what the names of the concessionaires in each GMA, are;
(c) how long each concessionaire has been operating;
(d) how much revenue was generated from the concessions from 2016 to 2019, year by year; and
(e) what benefits, if any, accrued to the local communities as a result of the concessions. ___________________________
